title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the feature does not work as expected.
OB: Currently, when a user selects a field in the Type Hierarchy view and tries to add Javadoc information to it, no action is performed and the Javadoc is not added to the field.
EB: I expect that when a field is selected in the Type Hierarchy view, the user should be able to add Javadoc information to the field successfully. The Javadoc should be added and associated with the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view. 
3. Attempt to add Javadoc information to the selected field. 
4. Verify that the Javadoc is not added and no action is performed.
